column2: an A.M. Eatery////Hubby and I were in Denver a couple of years ago
column3: and we stopped by Snooze there. There was a two hour wait so we ended up going elsewhere. Today
column4: we decided to finally visit this newish location in my hometown. We waited 45 minutes. Was it tedious? Of course. But the food was sooo worth it. We now regret not having waited for two hours in Denver!
